channel.title: Homes on Junbo Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Junbo Zhang

item.description: Biography Junbo Zhang is currently a Data Scientist at JD Finance Group. He is leading AI Platform Division of Urban Computing Business Unit, JD Finance Group. His research interests include deep learning, big data analytics, large-scale machine learning, and spatio-temporal data mining. He has published over 30 research papers (e.g., AI, IEEE TKDE, KDD, AAAI, IJCAI) in refereed journals and conferences, among which one paper was selected as the ESI Hot Paper, two as the ESI Highly Cited Paper, and two as the Best Paper Award.

item.title: Recent News
item.description: Aug. 2018: Paper accepted in CIKM 2018. Jul. 2018: Paper accepted in KDD 2018. Apr. 2018: Papers accepted in IJCAI 2018 and AI Journal. Dec. 2017: Paper accepted in AAAI 2018.

item.title: Custom Section
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. To remove this section, either delete content/home/teaching.md or edit the frontmatter of the file to deactivate the widget by setting active = false.

item.title: Awards & Honors
item.description: ACM Chengdu Doctoral Dissertation Award, 2016. Excellent Doctoral Dissertation Nomination Award of Chinese Association for Artificial Intelligence (CAAI), 2016 Best Paper Award of IEEE Chengdu Section, 2016 Best Paper Award of Tsinghua Science and Technology, 2015 Outstanding Ph.D. Graduate of Sichuan Province, 2013 National Scholarship, China, 2013 National Scholarship, China, 2012 “Si Shi Yang Hua ()” Medal in Southwest Jiaotong University, 2012. 2009-2014 Special Grade Scholarship for PhD Students, Southwest Jiaotong University First Prize in the 9th “Huawei Cup” National Postgraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling, China, 2012

item.title: Services
item.description: Program Committee Member AAAI 2018 CIKM 2017 UrbComp 2016,2017,2018 Reviewer for Journals ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology (TIST) ACM Transactions on Knowledge Discovery from Data (TKDD) IEEE Transactions on Cybernetics IEEE Transactions on Computers (TOC) IEEE/ACM Transactions on Computational Biology and Bioinformatics (TCBB) IEEE Transactions on NanoBioscience Information Sciences Neurocomputing Knowledge-Based Systems World Wide Web Journal (WWWJ) International Journal of Cloud Computing (IJCC) International Journal of Bioinformatics Research and Applications (IJBRA) International Journal of Computational Intelligence Systems (IJCIS)
